===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} [[chariots]] and [[cavalry]]
# {{lb|zh|archaic}} general of [[chariots]] and [[cavalry]] (a high ranking position during the [[w:Han Dynasty|Han Dynasty]])
# {{lb|zh|archaic}} a [[term]] of [[respect]] for [[one]]'s [[superior]]

===Usage notes===
Ranked just below supreme general ([[大將軍]]). Same rank as general of fast cavalry ([[驃騎將軍]]).
: jūjì: is the traditional orthodox pronunciation (still prevalent in Taiwan)
: chēqí: has become more accepted in recent years (especially in the PRC).
